channel.title: Comments on: A Friendlier Contact Page Launches Monday, August 24, 2015

item.title: By: Call for Volunteers: Help Make Our Site More Awesome | Off the Shelf
item.dc:creator: Call for Volunteers: Help Make Our Site More Awesome | Off the Shelf
item.description: […] web teamÂ took a small step toward a simpler, more scannable site when we launched our redesigned contact page last year, and we’re ready to bring that kind of clarity to the rest of our site. But first, […]
item.content:encoded: […] web teamÂ took a small step toward a simpler, more scannable site when we launched our redesigned contact page last year, and we’re ready to bring that kind of clarity to the rest of our site. But first, […]

item.title: By: Anneliese Taylor
item.dc:creator: Anneliese Taylor
item.description: Looks much cleaner now. I just looked at the pictures. :)
item.content:encoded: Looks much cleaner now. I just looked at the pictures. ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Tab McDaniel
item.dc:creator: Tab McDaniel
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2015/08/18/a-friendlier-contact-page-launches-monday-august-24-2015/#comment-462">Julia Kochi</a>.
Thanks for the feedback, Julia. Duly noted on the Ed team needing a school/department field; as for possible My Account/MyAccess confusion ... <del datetime="2015-08-19T17:35:34+00:00">we'll keep an eye out, and modify as needed.</del> BOOP! The link now reads <strong>My Library Account</strong>
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Julia Kochi.

Thanks for the feedback, Julia. Duly noted on the Ed team needing a school/department field; as for possible My Account/MyAccess confusion … we’ll keep an eye out, and modify as needed. BOOP! The link now reads My Library Account

item.title: By: Julia Kochi
item.dc:creator: Julia Kochi
item.description:
Much simpler (and I read the whole post!).
In the email form, I would really like to have a field for school or department. The Ed librarians use this information to help us triage tickets internally.
I also wonder if My Account in the right-hand column might be confused with MyAccess.
item.content:encoded:
Much simpler (and I read the whole post!).

In the email form, I would really like to have a field for school or department. The Ed librarians use this information to help us triage tickets internally.

I also wonder if My Account in the right-hand column might be confused with MyAccess.

item.title: By: Tab McDaniel
item.dc:creator: Tab McDaniel
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2015/08/18/a-friendlier-contact-page-launches-monday-august-24-2015/#comment-459">Gail Persily</a>.
Good call, Gail; the link is updated at https://drupal-stage-review.library.ucsf.edu/contact/update, and will go live on Monday.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Gail Persily.

Good call, Gail; the link is updated at https://drupal-stage-review.library.ucsf.edu/contact/update, and will go live on Monday.

item.title: By: Gail Persily
item.dc:creator: Gail Persily
item.description:
Cool.
I suggest we have the Tech Support link in the right-hand column go to https://www.library.ucsf.edu/services/computing/help rather than https://www.library.ucsf.edu/services/computing.
item.content:encoded:
Cool.

I suggest we have the Tech Support link in the right-hand column go to https://www.library.ucsf.edu/services/computing/help rather than https://www.library.ucsf.edu/services/computing.
